#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# python3.5

import sys

a = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
b = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
c = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())

lemon = 0
apple = 0
pear = 0

if a > 0:
    lemon = a * 2

if b > 0:
    apple = b

if c > 0:
    pear = c * 4

print(lemon + apple + pear)
